ai-tha-ap464:1.2_0: the world is attached to the world,
ai-tha-ap464:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap464:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap464:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap464:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bhūmajaka.
ai-tha-ap464:7.1_0: who had been swept away by the senior monks, who were a companion.
